Description: Body sherd of large Chian Mature Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed black; part of rosette with alternating added red and white petals and red central dot; below, two white bands; exterior, slip partly worn; painted decoration consisting of possible boar (part of forelegs and head remaining) to right; part of elaborate rosette and dot rosette as filling ornament.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0433) (phase 2)
